content: I like these reflection prompts. I've been using a reading log to track my progress and write down my thoughts on each book. I've found it really helpful in keeping me motivated and reflecting on what I've read. Speaking of which, I've been listening to audiobooks during my daily commute, which has been a game-changer. I just finished "Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind" by Yuval Noah Harari and "Daisy Jones and The Six" by Taylor Jenkins Reid. Do you have any recommendations for audiobook platforms or services that offer a wide selection of titles?
